all mod aloud!

Can I launch Tonight and place a heavy supply ship on minmus, followed by a rover?

That will kick it off!

> 
> Can I launch Tonight and place a heavy supply ship on minmus, followed by a rover?
> 
> That will kick it off!

yes but pleese fill the form so i can see were you are puting it ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Why start another one?

i had big ideas too big for thoes ones

It just seems like naming it the 'Community Mod Base 4' is suggesting that the third one, like the second one is now, is no longer active.

I feel it should be renamed something that makes it clear that this is not a consecutive community base, but rather a parallel one.

Just my two cents ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

It depends what you want to do with it, for example, if you want to focus on stations (something the current one does not do), you could call it something like the 'Mod Community Space Station Network'. I have no idea where you\'re focusing it though, so I\'ll leave naming it up to you.

And good luck! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> It depends what you want to do with it, for example, if you want to focus on stations (something the current one does not do), you could call it something like the 'Mod Community Space Station Network'. I have no idea where you\'re focusing it though, so I\'ll leave naming it up to you.
> 
> And good luck! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

mod space and land network!

No, i mean literally on the sea.

name:zekes

craft(file and name):ZLRP 4.craft, ZLRP 7.craft

base:Z1 minmus (12Â°-21\'-43' S, 13Â°-17\'-51' W)

mods used:stock,c7, novapunch, thunderbird 3, mechjeb (and plugin), cart mod (and plugin), and several others i cant\'t remember (refer to picture)

picturs of craft: 

![index.php?action=dlattach;topic=13370.0;attach=21585;image](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=13370.0;attach=21585;image)

saved file: see below

there is a fuel depot on minmus (ZLRP 4) and an unmanned lander rover orbiting Kerbin (i didn\'t have time to get it to the base).

I chose this spot because it was one of the few perfectly flat areas to build a large base, so sorry its not near a KSC base.

Oh, just a tip, the tanker came down a bit hard and lost a few struts, so it might tip over. If switching to it, turn SAS on quickly and DON\'T HIT IT WITH THE ROVER, it will fall over.

Ill add more later.

ok will add to persistance during the weekend ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
